section.heading: Interim eligibility reporting requirement.
section.text: The Department, no later than February 1 of each year, shall provide a report to the Council of the District of Columbia and the Interagency Council on Homelessness that shall include the following information:

para.text: Number of families placed in an interim eligibility placement;
Average length of stay in an interim eligibility placement;
Number of eligibility denials during and subsequent to an interim eligibility placement;
Number of appeals of eligibility determinations during and subsequent to an interim eligibility placement;
Number of interim eligibility appeals resolved via administrative review;
Average time for issuance of decision for review of interim eligibility appeal via administrative review;
Number of interim eligibility appeals brought to the Office of Administrative Hearings;
Average time for issuance of decision for review of interim eligibility appeal via the Office of Administrative Hearings; and
Final placement outcome for each family placed into an interim eligibility placement.
